body_html:
Tensor object should be initiative invoked the closed method if you don't want use the tensor. You can n't expect the GC to collect this object otherwise will occur the memory leak.
But I don't see any reference to mention this important behave in the document, it is very dangerous. In my product environment, the developer forget trigger the close function, the product meet OOM and crash last.
To compensate this, I suggest in the finalize method (tensor.java) to close the tensor object, to avoid the developer forget closing the tensor object. At last, GC will trigger the finalize the method to close the tensor object.

body:
Tensor object should be initiative invoked the closed method if you don't want use the tensor. You can n't expect the GC to collect this object otherwise will occur the memory leak.
But I  don't see any reference to mention this important behave in the document, it is very dangerous. In my product environment, the developer forget trigger the close function, the product meet OOM and crash last.
To compensate this, I suggest in the finalize method (tensor.java) to close the tensor object,  to avoid the developer forget closing the tensor object. At last, GC will trigger the finalize the method to close the tensor object.
